name: Wire Hang Redux
description:
I originallCoffee-break arcade videogame.

I made the first version of this game in 2004 and updated it in 2011. This build is from 2016 and was previously for sale on the Mac App Store and Gumroad. Have fun!

Mac — 10.6 and above (32-bit app)

Windows — requires DirectX 7+ for sound, OpenGL for graphics

Linux — runs perfectly under Wine
